data.partBlankContent: Patti walks her dog three times a day. They g_ out bef___ work, at lu___, a__ in t__ evening. Patti li___ to wa__ around t__ neighborhood o_ their wa___. Her d__ Skippy lo___ to g_ to t__ dog pa__. After their evening walk, Patti usually throws a ball to Skippy in their yard.
data.fullContent: Patti walks her dog three times a day. They go out before work, at lunch, and in the evening. Patti likes to walk around the neighborhood on their walks. Her dog Skippy loves to go to the dog park. After their evening walk, Patti usually throws a ball to Skippy in their yard.
data.answer: 帕蒂每天遛狗三次。他们在上班前、午餐时和晚上出去。帕蒂喜欢在附近散步。她的狗Skippy喜欢去狗公园。傍晚散步后，帕蒂通常会在院子里把球扔给Skippy。
